centerName: Dr. Admikew Xarunta Caafimaadka iyo Qalliinka

about.title: Ku Saabsan Naga
about.subtitle: Bixinta daryeelka jaraha ee aamin ah iyo khabiir ah ee Jigjiga, Itoobiya.

features.title: Dhaktarro Khabiir ah
features.description: Kooxdeenu waxay ka kooban tahay dhaktarro khabiir ah oo ku dedican inay bixiyaan daryeel tayo leh oo hubinaya natiijooyin guul leh marti-doonayaasheena.

features.title: Qalabka Casriga ah
features.description: Waxaan bixinaa qalabka caafimaad ee horumaray iyo fasiliti casri ah si loo helo khibrad ugu fiican ee daryeelka jaraha.

features.title: Daryeel Tayo leh
features.description: Waxaa nagu go'an inaan ilaalino heerar sare ee amniga martida iyo inaan bixino daryeelka jaraha ee tayo sare mar walba.

features.title: Taageerada Martida
features.description: Kooxdeena naxariis leh waxay bixisaa taageero joogto ah ka hor, inta lagu jiro iyo ka dib jaraha si loo hubiyo soo kabasho ugu fiican.

mission.title: Mishankeena
mission.description: Waxaa nagu go'an inaan bixino daryeelka jaraha ee tayo sare leh ee martida ku saleysan adeegsiga horumarka, habraacyada axaadiqda iyo teknoolajiyada caafimaad ee horumaray.

vision.title: Aragtideena
vision.description: Inaan noqono bixiyeyaasha ugu sarreeya ee daryeelka jaraha, aan go'aaminno heerarka ugu sarreeya ee tayada iyo amniga martida ee Jigjiga iyo gobollada ku xeeran.

values.title: Qiimahayaga Aasaasiga ah
values.description: Waxaa nagu go'an inaan bixino daryeel naxariis leh, tayo sare, iyo daacadnimo, iyadoo la saadaalinayo wanaaga martida. Iyadoo la wada shaqeynayo iyo habraacyada axaadiqda, waxaan ujeednaa inaan horumarinno natiijooyinka iyo caafimaadka bulshadeena.

hero.description: Qalliino horumarsan oo leh tignoolajiyad casri ah iyo daryeel naxariis leh

whyChooseUs.title: Maxaa Noo Dooranaysaa
whyChooseUs.description: Khibrad qalliinka oo heer sare ah kooxdayada takhasuska leh

expertise.title: Dhakhaatiir Takhasus leh
expertise.description: Dhakhaatiir aad u tababaran oo khibrad leh

technology.title: Tignoolajiyad Casri ah
technology.description: Qalab caafimaad oo casri ah iyo xarumo

care.title: Daryeel Bukaanka
care.description: Daryeel shaqsi ah iyo taageero dhammaystiran

services.title: Adeegyadayada
services.pageDescription: Daryeel qalliin oo dhammaystiran oo leh tignoolajiyad casri ah iyo takhasusleyaal khibrad leh
services.subtitle: Daryeel qalliin oo dhammaystiran dhammaan baahiyahaaga

cardio.title: Qalliinka Wadnaha
cardio.description: Qalliinada horumarsan ee wadnaha, sambabaha iyo laabta

neuro.title: Qalliinka Maskaxda
neuro.description: Daryeel qalliin oo gaar ah oo maskaxda, lafta dhabarka iyo neerfaha

plastic.title: Qalliinka Qurxinta & Dib u Dhiska
plastic.description: Qalliinada qurxinta iyo dib u dhiska

pediatric.title: Qalliinka Carruurta
pediatric.description: Daryeel qalliin oo gaar ah oo carruurta

urological.title: Qalliinka Kaadida
urological.description: Daaweynta qalliinka ee kaadida iyo taranka ragga

general.title: Qalliinka Guud
general.description: Noocyo kala duwan oo qalliinno guud ah

cta.title: Ma u Baahan Tahay La-talin?
cta.description: Kooxdayada qalliinka ee khibradda leh ayaa halkan kuu jooga. Ballan sameyso maanta.

faq.title: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Isweydiiyo
faq.noQuestions: Ma jiraan su'aalo adeegan ku saabsan

gallery.title: Sawirrada
gallery.viewLarger: Riix si aad u aragto sawir weyn
gallery.noImages: Ma jiraan sawirro adeegan ku saabsan

footer.aboutDescription: Waxaan nahay xarun qalliin oo takhasus leh oo bixisa adeegyo caafimaad oo dhammeystiran.
footer.working: Had iyo jeer halkan kuu nahay - Adeeg 24/7!

faq.title: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Isweydiiyo
faq.description: Ka hel jawaabaha su'aalaha guud ee ku saabsan adeegyadayada qalliinka.
faq.contactPrompt: Haddii aadan ka helin su'aashaada halkan, fadlan nala soo xiriir.

surgeryTypes.question: Noocee qalliin ayaad samaysaan?
surgeryTypes.answer: Waxaan bixinaa noocyo kala duwan oo qalliin ah oo ay ku jiraan wadnaha iyo laabta, maskaxda, wajiga, guud ahaan, carruurta, qurxinta, iyo qalliinka kaadida.

consultation.question: Sideen balan u qabsan karaa?
consultation.answer: Waxaad balan ka qabsan kartaa adoo si toos ah u soo waca xarunteena ama buuxiya foomka xiriirka ee websaydkayaga. Shaqaalaheena ayaa kula soo xiriiri doona 24 saac gudahood.

insurance.question: Ma aqbashaan caymiska?
insurance.answer: Haa, waxaan la shaqeynaa inta badan shirkadaha caymiska waaweyn. Fadlan la xiriir shaqaalaheena maamulka si aad u hesho macluumaad gaar ah oo ku saabsan caymiskaaga.

beforeSurgery.question: Maxaan filayaa qalliinka ka hor?
beforeSurgery.answer: Ka hor qalliinka, waxaad yeelan doontaa la-talin dhammeystiran oo dhakhtarkaaga qalliinka ah, waxaad heli doontaa tilmaamo faahfaahsan oo qalliinka ka horeeya, iyo baaritaanno caafimaad oo lagama maarmaan ah si loo hubiyo inaad diyaar u tahay qalliinka.

postCare.question: Daryeel noocee ah ayaad bixisaan qalliinka kadib?
postCare.answer: Waxaan bixinaa daryeel dhammeystiran oo qalliinka kadib ah oo ay ku jiraan booqashooyin joogto ah, adeegyo baxnaanin marka loo baahdo, iyo taageero degdeg ah 24/7 bukaanadeena.

doctors.title: Dhakhaatiir Takhasus Leh
doctors.description: Dhakhaatiir khibrad leh oo ku takhasusay qeybaha kala duwan

surgeries.title: Qalliino Guul Ah
surgeries.description: Qalliino si guul leh loo dhammeeyay

satisfaction.title: Raalli Ahaanshaha Bukaanka
satisfaction.description: Jawaab-celin wanaagsan oo ka timid bukaanadeena

experience.title: Bilood Khibrad ah
experience.description: Bilood adeeg caafimaad oo daacad ah

data.name: Abdi Mohamed
data.text: Daryeelkii aan ka helay Xarunta Qalliinka Dr. Admikew wuxuu ahaa mid heer sare ah. Kooxda caafimaadku waxay ahaayeen kuwo xirfad leh oo naxariis badan inta lagu jiray qallinkayga wadnaha.

data.name: Hodan Muktar
data.text: Waxaan ka cabsanaa qalliinkayga, laakiin dhakhaatiirta iyo shaqaalaha waxay iga dhigeen mid degan oo nabad qaba. Daryeelka dabagalka ahaa aad buu u fiicnaa.

data.name: Solomon Tsegaye
data.text: Goobo casri ah iyo koox caafimaad oo xirfad sare leh. Uma aanan baahnayn daryeel ka wanaagsan intii aan soo kabsanaayay.

contact.title: Nala Soo Xiriir
contact.subtitle: Wixii su'aalo ama faallooyin ah, si xor ah noola soo xiriir halkan

form.title: Nala Soo Xiriir
form.name: Magaca oo Dhamaystiran
form.description: Suâ€™aal ama faallo ma hayso? Waxaan jeclaan lahayn inaan maqalno.
form.required: * Goobaha looga baahanyahay waa lama huraan
form.subject: Cinwaan (Subject)
form.error: Haye! Qalad ayaa dhacay. Fadlan dib isku day.

payment.successMessage: Lacag-bixintaadu si guul leh ayaa u dhamaatay.
